Name: test_relation_with_no_database_name
Description: Test that a relation with no database name doesn't block the charm.

Name: test_pre_upgrade_check
Description: Test that the pre-upgrade-check action runs successfully.

Name: test_user_with_extra_roles
Description: Test superuser actions and the request for more permissions.

Name: test_password_rotation
Description: Test password rotation action.

Name: test_build_and_deploy
Description: Build and deploy three unit of PostgreSQL.

Name: test_admin_role
Description: Test that the admin role gives access to all the databases.

Name: test_two_applications_doesnt_share_the_same_relation_data
Description: Test that two different application connect to the database with different credentials.

Name: test_relation_data_is_updated_correctly_when_scaling
Description: Test that relation data, like connection data, is updated correctly when scaling.

Name: test_consistency
Description: Write to primary, read data from secondaries (check consistency).

Name: test_tls_enabled
Description: Test that TLS is enabled when relating to the TLS Certificates Operator.

Name: test_relation_with_self_signed_certificates_operator
Description: Test the relation with the Self Signed Certificates operator.

Name: test_deploy_active
Description: Build the charm and deploy it.

Name: test_landscape_scalable_bundle_db
Description: Deploy Landscape Scalable Bundle to test the 'db-admin' relation.

Name: test_database_relation_with_charm_libraries
Description: Test basic functionality of database relation interface.

Name: test_storage_re_use
Description:
Verifies that database units with attached storage correctly repurpose storage.

    It is not enough to verify that Juju attaches the storage. Hence test checks that the
    postgresql properly uses the storage that was provided. (ie. doesn't just re-sync everything
    from primary, but instead computes a diff between current storage and primary storage.)

Name: test_deploy_latest
Description: Simple test to ensure that the PostgreSQL and application charms get deployed.

Name: test_an_application_can_connect_to_multiple_aliased_database_clusters
Description: Test that an application can connect to different clusters of the same database.

Name: test_no_read_only_endpoint_in_standalone_cluster
Description: Test that there is no read-only endpoint in a standalone cluster.

Name: test_pre_upgrade_check
Description: Test that the pre-upgrade-check action runs successfully.

Name: test_full_cluster_restart[SIGTERM-postgres]
Description:
This tests checks that a cluster recovers from a full cluster restart.

    The test can be called a full cluster crash when the signal sent to the OS process
    is SIGKILL.

Name: test_deploy_active
Description: Build the charm and deploy it.

Name: test_upgrade_from_stable
Description: Test updating from stable channel.

Name: test_build_and_deploy
Description: Build and deploy three unit of PostgreSQL.

Name: test_empty_password
Description: Test that the password can't be set to an empty string.

Name: test_network_cut
Description: Completely cut and restore network.

Name: test_an_application_can_request_multiple_databases
Description: Test that an application can request additional databases using the same interface.

Name: test_no_password_change_on_invalid_password
Description: Test that in general, there is no change when password validation fails.

Name: test_relation_data_is_updated_correctly_when_scaling
Description: Test that relation data, like connection data, is updated correctly when scaling.

Name: test_cluster_restore
Description: Recreates the cluster from storage volumes.

Name: test_network_cut_without_ip_change
Description: Completely cut and restore network (situation when the unit IP doesn't change).

Name: test_forceful_restart_without_data_and_transaction_logs
Description: A forceful restart with deleted data and without transaction logs (forced clone).

Name: test_full_cluster_restart[SIGTERM-/snap/charmed-postgresql/[0-9]*/usr/bin/patroni]
Description:
This tests checks that a cluster recovers from a full cluster restart.

    The test can be called a full cluster crash when the signal sent to the OS process
    is SIGKILL.

Name: test_build_and_deploy
Description: Build and deploy two PostgreSQL clusters.

Name: test_deploy_charms
Description: Deploy both charms (application and database) to use in the tests.

Name: test_an_application_can_connect_to_multiple_database_clusters
Description: Test that an application can connect to different clusters of the same database.

Name: test_deploy_stable
Description: Simple test to ensure that the PostgreSQL and application charms get deployed.

Name: test_full_cluster_restart[SIGKILL-/snap/charmed-postgresql/[0-9]*/usr/bin/patroni]
Description:
This tests checks that a cluster recovers from a full cluster restart.

    The test can be called a full cluster crash when the signal sent to the OS process
    is SIGKILL.

Name: test_reelection
Description: Kill primary unit, check reelection.

Name: test_plugins
Description: Build and deploy one unit of PostgreSQL and then test the available plugins.

Name: test_password_from_secret_same_as_cli
Description:
Checking if password is same as returned by CLI.

    I.e. we're manipulating the secret we think we're manipulating.

Name: test_no_data_replicated_between_clusters
Description: Check that writes in one cluster are not replicated to another cluster.

Name: test_read_only_endpoint_in_scaled_up_cluster
Description: Test that there is read-only endpoint in a scaled up cluster.

Name: test_mailman3_core_db
Description: Deploy Mailman3 Core to test the 'db' relation.

Name: test_full_cluster_restart[SIGKILL-postgres]
Description:
This tests checks that a cluster recovers from a full cluster restart.

    The test can be called a full cluster crash when the signal sent to the OS process
    is SIGKILL.
